item.title: 3 Energy Stocks That Could Benefit from Geopolitical Tensions
item.description: Exxon Mobil, Chevron, and Baker Hughes offer strong dividends, global scale, and upside potential if geopolitical tensions drive oil and gas prices hi...

item.title: 3 Reasons Amazon Could Be at an All-Time High by October
item.description: Amazon is closing in on its record highs, with analyst support, macro tailwinds, and seasonal catalysts pointing to more upside ahead.

item.title: Workday Rising… To Fresh Record High Stock Prices
item.description: Workday is positioned for a stock price rebound that could be explosive, set new highs, and gain momentum sufficient to sustain a long-term rally.

item.title: McDonald’s: New All-Time Highs Are Inevitable
item.description: McDonald's stock price is on track to hit a new high, driven by growth, cash flow, and capital returns. Analysts see value in the value meal pricing.

item.title: Joby's Stock Is Quiet, But Its Commercial Engine Is In Overdrive
item.description: Joby Aviation (JOBY) secures Uber access and a White House eVTOL pilot fast-track, creating powerful catalysts while shares consolidate near $14.
